ygData.subject: Re: Words, WHERE?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sweet, can t wait to hear how it works, I ve got one of the 3 words required (the easy one...it s sort of like mcdonalds monopoly when dealing with research
ygData.messageBody:
Sweet, can't wait to hear how it works, I've got one of the 3 words required
(the easy one...it's sort of like mcdonalds monopoly when dealing with
research components) On another note, I saw that they put screaming terror
in with the latest patch, anyone play with this yet? From what I heard it
has the dual effect of fear, as well as the enchanter spell memory blur,
should be *very* handy for separating those pesky halfling deputies that
like to hang out in pairs if that's how it really works.

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> I'm about to Research it myself raising my Research skill some more then
I'm
> going to research that spell. As of right now you can never be mad about
> another spell that does damage especially one that heals you. When I get
> that spell going I'll let you know may be awhile though I'm going out of
> town tomorrow.
